attributes.action: Make Parent and Child Parking Spaces illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parent and Child parking spaces are discriminatory against those without children and those who have grown up children. As children are a blessing not a disability they should be prohibited in public car parks on the grounds of discrimination and it should not be possible to introduce local bye-laws to penalise or charge those without children who park in spaces marked as Parent and Child spaces
